New Records: Domantas Sabonis recorded a career-high 28 rebounds
Key Match Events: Celtics were outscored 38-21 in the fourth quarter
Celtics shot 14.3 percent from three in the fourth quarter
Kings shot 72.7 percent in the fourth quarter
Pre-Game Insights: Celtics have to fight their way out of this rough patch
Celtics must be more consistent on offense
Celtics' main core played at full strength for an extended period only three times this season
Post-Match Reflections: Jayson Tatum says the Celtics must dig deeper after losing seven of their last 15 games
Jaylen Brown believes they will be better and the first step toward improvement starts in the film room
Kristaps Porzingis is confident they'll bounce back
Miscellaneous Highlights: Celtics' next opportunity to bounce back will be Sunday night when they host the New Orleans Pelicans
